website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus Tough TG-5 is a go-anywhere camera with a fast lens, speedy response, and 4K video, but it's more expensive than previous iterations.
cons: Rear screen can pick up scratches

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little camera and exactly what I need for clambering around ships engine rooms and tanks etc. Takes brilliant photos for its size, can be fully automatic or semi manual and feels incredibly well built with a nice weight to it. A total quality item from Olympus.
customer_reviews.author: Captain K.

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are very good, have not gone into all the functions yet ...
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are very good, have not gone into all the functions yet but am impressed with the performance so far. had no worries when out with walking club in arctic conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Allan

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera with amazing macro
customer_reviews.text: I'm fed up with lugging my DSLR and multiple lenses around, so I wanted an everyday camera that could take a few knocks, was waterproof, but delivered good quality pictures. The picture quality is remarkable for a compact camera. Great for travelling, as you can transfer the pics to your phone via WiFi. Absolutely blown away by the macro capabilities. The photo is of a ballpoint pen to show how good the macro feature is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stills meh video
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but think twice if you are wanting it for 4k video. It is pretty limited in this department and will only let you record short videos at a time. For stills though it is very versatile and once you get a hang of the settings just about anything is possible.
customer_reviews.author: MarkiMark

customer_reviews.title: Robust little, easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this camera. As I do a lot of walking in sometimes very inclement weather. It suits me well. Am having fun learning everything about it. Very pleased with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic handheld camera.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Take it everywhere. It’s survived many v high and v low temperatures and being dropped multiple times. The shooting modes are fab.
customer_reviews.author: Tigwiggles

customer_reviews.title: Its waterproof and tough
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much so far but when I have used it pictures are great and relatively easy to use
customer_reviews.author: markwoco

customer_reviews.title: Lens Flare ruins pictures
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this item as unfit for purpose as at medium to full zoom under sunny or overcast conditions, at all f stops, and with a lens hood fitted there is an oval flare in the centre of the picture. This seems to be a common problem as it is mentioned in several forums.
customer_reviews.author: MR MJ BOOKER

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of good functionalities, including 4K video (even if it drains the battery in minutes), the quality of the pictures is ok and it looks resistant. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it on holiday for first time and am impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whalley

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant. Macro capability is superb. Not recommended for casual snapper though, as many options that can get complex.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Late review but even better than to say it's almost been a year and such a great piece of equipment. Does everything it says.
customer_reviews.author: KrisFilm

customer_reviews.title: A good all round camera and excellent for macro photography.
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought this to replace my previous digital camera and I am very pleased with it and find it to be much better than the previous camera (a Panasonic digital) I have not yet tried out all the functionality but have found it easy to connect by wi fi to my phone, and to download images to the PC. It is robust and easy to use. One of the main reason I purchased it was for macro photography, it was reviewed as excelling in this aspect and it really does. The macro photography is outstanding for a compact digital.
customer_reviews.author: carol bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit.
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of reviews, and I am not disappointed in this choice. It feels as sturdy as suggested and won’t hesitate to use it for what it’s designed. Photos great for camera in its class.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: For the price I can only rate this camera as a 2 star. The pictures are ok but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can only rate this camera as a 2 star. The pictures are ok but nothing special. I get just as good pictures from my waterproof Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX10 and that has taken quite a few knocks over the years without an issue. The Sony is also less bulky that the TG-5 and I find myself taking the Sony as a first option and only taking the TG-5 with me if I need a second camera
customer_reviews.author: Magichat

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I returned this as wife was unhappy at expensive pre-holiday purchases and then on the plane there was a special feature on this very same product as the best travel camera and I’m so sad I don’t own it 😭
customer_reviews.author: D. Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: *TERRIBLE* underwater photo quality.
customer_reviews.text: *TERRIBLE* underwater photo quality. I feel like 4 years old GoPro Hero3+ does higher quality underwater photos. What's more disappointing is this was the primary camera for a Caribbean holiday - wasted money and opportunity. Return in process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Been down the Grand Canyon with it filming ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been down the Grand Canyon with it filming the rapids. It has been repeatedly smothered with white water and sand. Just hope thesesls will remain functional long term.
customer_reviews.author: rory De Souza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and small carry around camera.
customer_reviews.text: The first impression is that it is an excellent and small carry around camera with excellent picture quality, the TG-5 has less grain and is much sharper than the TG-4, menu structure is much better and easy to use, works well with the android software for remote control, very happy with this camera, look at the DPReview website for test and samples.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrik

customer_reviews.title: Far too complicated
customer_reviews.text: If you are a professional or advanced photographer and like lots of bells and whistles then this is the camera for you. It also probably explains the very high price (compared with previous Toughs. The camera itelf is big, heavy and clunky, especially for underwater stuff - not nearly as nice as the compact TG4 that we had. I wish I had looked at the manual (all 134 pages of it!) and found out how complicated it was - then I would not have bought it. So if you want a simple camera that takes good pictures in and out of water, with a few refinements regarding light concitions etc, this is not the camera to buy
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Do not bother with this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is utter rubbish. Picture quality is poor and the features are non existent. The fiddly doors to the power recharge and the battery/SIM card are fiddly and prone to fault. Olympus refused to fix mine under warranty because I did not but it from an Olympus Authorised Dealer. Shocking level of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Tomkinson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Camera from a top brand.
customer_reviews.text: Superb everyday camera. It has loads of functionality. Easy to use, and carry around with you. Don't confuse with an slr. This is a really good point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: An extremely good quality rugged and waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: An extremely good quality rugged and waterproof camera. When you get this camera out others can see straight away that it's a high end canera. The accessories are very expensive just like this camera.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicGreen

customer_reviews.title: Needs a case
customer_reviews.text: Promoted as being suitable for extreme sports etc, I can't really see that this camera is any tougher than another. It has the usual number of buttons, flaps etc, all weak points in design. For the price I would have liked a case to protect it. The wifi transfer to phone is useful.
customer_reviews.author: buy-it-try-it

product_meta.title: Olympus TG-5 Tough Camera - Black
product_meta.description:
Ultimate adventures often involve the most challenging lighting conditions. From arctic twilight to the undersea world, the ability to deal with low light in particular is the key to a great image. A new image sensor with superb high-speed and high-sensitivity performance combined with the latest True Pic VIII image processor taken from our flagship system camera gives better image quality than before with enhanced dynamic range and improved response time. The new TG-5 lets you link GPS, compass, manometer and temperature data to your photos and videos, and transfer it via Wi-Fi to your smartphone or tablet. The dual-pane protective glass is just one new addition to the other proven tough capabilities, you can keep shooting whatever nature throws at you. Extreme shifts in temperature can cause condensation on lenses. The TG-5 prevents this with dual-pane protective glass, meaning you can keep shooting regardless. Capture even more of the action. Making great moves look amazing means capturing every detail at just the right moment. The TG-5s cutting-edge image technology makes that easier than ever. Its high-speed VIII processor allows you to record in incredible 4K resolution and create full-HD sized, 120fps slow-motion movies. Relive the moment in full. Capture wonderful experiences in 4K and slow motion video, along with tracking info and share them with ease. Import field sensor data like compass, manometer and temperature and images taken on the camera to a smartphone via the TG-5s built-in Wi-Fi and OI. Share capability, then link them to create videos with a tracking data overlay in the free Olympus Image Track (OI. Track) app. Waterproof 15m The TG-5s superb waterproof performance down to depths of up to 15 meters not only enables you to shoot in heavy rain or white water rapids, but even while snorkelling. Shockproof 2.1m To protect the bright 1:2.0 high-speed lens, the TG-5 is built with Olympus unique and outstanding shock-absorption technology, making it robust enough to withstand a drop test from a height of 2.1 metres. Freeze proof -10C Every part in this camera, including the electronic components, is designed to withstand the harsh conditions of winter sports, with operation guaranteed down to minus 10C. Crushproof (100kg) The interior protective structure of the camera is built to withstand a load of 100 kg, so you will not have to worry about accidentally sitting on your camera when carrying it in your back pocket. 12 Megapixel The newly developed image sensor used in the TG-5 delivers high-speed performance and superb high-sensitivity. It gives better image quality than before with less noise and improved image detail and delivers natural-looking, high-resolution movies. VIII The TG-5 features the latest Truepic VIII image processor taken from the Olympus Pro flagship system camera OM-D E-M1 Mark II. Its improved image processing algorithm is even more powerful to deliver higher image resolution in low-contrast areas especially when shooting at low ISO sensitivity. Maximum ISO12800 Even better quality with high ISO sensitivity. The newly developed image sensor and high-speed image processor reduce noise in your images when using high ISO sensitivity. 4x Zoom Lens Whether for birds-eye view shots of scenic vistas at wide-angle settings (35mm equivalent: 25mm) or zoomed-in shots of faraway objects at telephoto settings (35mm equivalent: 100mm) the 4x zoom lens delivers photos that match your intentions. Pro Capture Mode When out in the wild and you want to capture precise moments, sometimes you need a little help. The TG-5 is equipped with a class-exclusive Pro Capture Mode that captures a series of shots before and after you fire the shutter to help you get the exact shot you want, with ease. Art Filter Art Filters let you give your photos a choice of classic effects. Explore your creativity using 14 popular options. Art Filters provide an expanded range of photo expressions for even more photo fun. Live Composite Whether you shoot star trails, fireworks or fireflies with stationary subjects in the same image, Live Composite combines only those areas of multiple images that contain new light without over-exposure that occurs in normal bulb shooting. RAW Recording With the TG-5 you can create the ideal image in post-production. Even when you are out and about, you can edit images in-camera. Save your images in the RAW format and use the included Olympus Viewer 3 software to fine tune parameters such as exposure, contrast, white balance and colour balance.

BOX CONTAINS
TG-5 Camera, Strap, Li-92 Lithium Ion Battery, F-5AC USB/AC Adapter, CB-USB12 UB Cable
feature_bullets: TG-5 Camera, Strap, Li-92 Lithium Ion Battery, F-5AC USB/AC Adapter, CB-USB12 UB Cable

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
